title: Alzheimer's Disease: What If There Was a Cure?: The Story of Ketones
description: Acting on new research showing that medium-chain fatty acids, which act like an alternative fuel in the insulin-deficient Alzheimer's brain, can sometimes reverse or at least stabilize the disease, author Dr. Mary T. Newport has demonstrated through her care for her husband that there is hope, relief, and perhaps a cure.
author: Mary T. Newport
